issues.description: The variable reference table doesn't mention that variables are provided as space-separated strings only. Format modifiers (:json, :lines, :csv) and glob patterns (:*.rs) exist in GitChangeTracker.resolve_variable() but are not available through the standard interpolation system. This matches the warning in index.md but isn't mentioned on this page.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a note or admonition mentioning that variables are provided as space-separated strings and reference shell-filtering.md for formatting options
